goal.core.mas

Class LaunchRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.mas.MultiLaunch
      • goal.core.mas.LaunchRule

  • public class LaunchRule
extends MultiLaunch
    A launch-rule is a launch with a precondition. Launch-rules connect agents with entities from environment-interfaces.
    Author:
    tristanbehrens

      • incrementApplicationCount

        public boolean incrementApplicationCount()
        If possible, Increments the application-count, that is how often the rule has been applied.
        Returns:
        true if the launch rule could be increased, or false if the maximum has been reached.
